title: First time design font
content:
Hi everyone.  
I m from Vietnam, This s first time i try to design type. It tooks me 6 hours to work in illustrator and 1 hour to tranfer those glyph to font lab. This s just thin version (some fake italic and bold). I just realised that designing type is very interesting. I would like to learn from you expert people in here.

Thank you for your comment.

I dont know how to do kerning in Fontlab :(  
 [http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3187/2434878634\_1f0590b201\_b.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018052651/http:/farm4.static.flickr.com/3187/2434878634_1f0590b201_b.jpg "http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3187/2434878634\_1f0590b201\_b.jpg")
author: hana
